all_of_us_are_the_movement: se_ All of us are the movement. We are participants together, not customers. As a participant you are in control of your personal information and you can delete your information when you want.
this_can_be_lengthy: se_ This can be lengthy, but bare with us. We want you to know :)
this_information_is_stored_encrypted: se_ This information is stored, encrypted and not seen by any other participant. Only the non-profit association sees this:
we_confirm_phone_numbers_to_increase_the: se_ We confirm phone numbers to increase the safety of all participants in the movement.
this_info_is_only_visible_in_the_app_for: se_ This information is only visible in the app for other participants:
your_social_media_information: se_ Your social media information, if you choose to connect Twitter and/or Facebook
if_you_are_supporter_of_the_self_sustain: se_ If you are supporter of the Self-Sustaining Garden on not.
the_number_of_experiences_you_have: se_ The number of Experiences you have.
comments_you_make_in_closed_groups_are_o: se_ Comments you make in closed groups are only seen for people in that group (how ever, rides in those groups are open).
rides_that_you_have_added_and_participat: se_ Rides that you have added and participated in.
groups_that_you_have_added_and_participa: se_ Groups that you have added and participated in.
experience_you_have_agreed_you_are_part_: se_ Experiences you have agreed you are a part of.
when_you_choose_to_show_you_live_locatio: se_ When you choose to show your live location (you are in control of how and when you do this)
the_information_you_provide_in_this_app_: se_ The information you provide in this app is stored as long as the app exists or until you choose to delete it. You delete your information at the settings section of your profile.
only_the_non_profit_association_that_act: se_ Only the non-profit association that acts as an enabler for the movement can see your phone number and e-mail. This information may be used to send you a newsletter or text message. Also, the system sometimes send you e-mails if you have forgotten your password or and Experience you're part of gets published.
skjutsgruppen_ideel_forening: se_ Skjutsgruppen ideell förening (Skjutsgruppen non-profit association) is responsible for your personal informatino and Mattias Jägerskog is you contat at the association.
for_questions_to_the_association_email: se_ For questions to the association e-mail hej@skjutsgruppen.nu
by_clicking_i_agree_you_agree: se_ By clicking "I agree" you agree to our privacy policy.
read_all_of_the_privacy_policy_here: se_ Read all of the privacy policy here
this_information_can_be_seen_by_other_pa: se_ This information can be seen by other participants using the app and externally for people not part of the movement:
we_recommend_you_to_sign_up_with_faceboo: se_ We recommend you sign up with Facebook or Twitter.
we_will_never_publish_without_you_knowin: se_ We will never publish to Facebook or Twitter without you knowing.
sign_up_the_long_way: se_ Or sign up the long way, it's fine as well.
your_email_is_confirmed_fill_first_and_l: se_ Your e-mail is confirmed! Now you fill in your first and last name.
need_to_do_is_confirm_cellphone_and_done: se_ All you need to do now is to confirm your cellphone number and you’re done!
you_will_confirm_by_sending_a_text_messa: se_ You will confirm by sending a text message with your unique code, from the phone you’re seeing this on right now  - to our number. The text message costs the same as an ordinary text message with your service provider
welcome_you_are_now_participating: se_ Welcome {{firstName}}! You are now participating in the non-profit ridesharing movement Skjutsgruppen!
press_enter_to_start_looking_around_and_: se_ Press enter to start looking around and say hi to other participants.
we_are_friends_of_friends_of_friends: se_ We are friends and friends of friends.
we_share_equally_of_offer_each_other_rid: se_ We share equally of offer each other rides for free. Because friends dont make money of friends.
by_clicking_i_agree_you_agree_to_partici: se_ By clicking "I agree" you agree to our participatory agreement.
read_all_of_the_agreement_here: se_ Read all of the agreement here
go_to_your_email_and_enter_the_confirmat: se_ Go to your e-mail {{email}} and enter the confirmation code we've sent you.
you_cannot_proceed_without_confirming_yo: se_ You can not proceed without confirming your e-mail. Did something go wrong? Press "Back" and start over.
or_signup_with_fb_or_twitter_instead: se_ Or sign up with Facebook or Twitter instead.
did_something_go_wrong_press_back: se_ Did something go wrong? Press “Back” and start over.
the_system_is_waiting_for_your_text_mess: se_ The system is waiting for your text message.
waiting_for_your_text_message: se_ Waiting for your text message
we_love_to_see_each_other_and_a_photo: se_ We love to see each other and a photo of you adds trust!
in_this_app_you_can_offer_your_spare_sea: se_ In this app you can offer your spare seats to others or ask for a ride.
add_or_join_groups_for_a_specific_distan: se_ Add or join groups for a specific distance, an area or a subject.
